data.Sentence_cn: 丹.鲁宾逊焦虑了整整一个星期。
data.Sentence: Dan Robinson has been worried all week.

data.Sentence_cn: 上星期二他收到当地警察局的一封信，
data.Sentence: Last Tuesday he received a letter from the local police.
In the letter he was asked to call at the station.

data.Sentence_cn: 丹奇怪警察为什么找他，
data.Sentence: Dan wondered why he was wanted by the police,

data.Sentence_cn: 但昨天还是去了，结果他不再担心了。
data.Sentence: but he went to the station yesterday and now he is not worried anymore.

data.Sentence_cn: 在警察局里，一位面带笑容的警察告诉他，他的自行车找到了。
data.Sentence: At the station, he was told by a smiling policeman that his bicycle had been found.

data.Sentence_cn: 那位警察对他说，那辆自行车是5天前在400英里外的一个小村里发现的，
data.Sentence: Five days ago, the policeman told him, the bicycle was picked up in a small village four hundred miles away.

data.Sentence_cn: 现在正用火车给他运回家来。
data.Sentence: It is now being sent to his home by train.

data.Sentence_cn: 丹听到这个消息后，惊奇万分，
data.Sentence: Dan was most surprised when he heard the news.

data.Sentence_cn: 但又感到非常好笑，因为他从未指望那辆自行车还能找到。
data.Sentence: He was amused too, because he never expected the bicycle to be found.

data.Sentence_cn: 这是20年前丹还是一个15岁的孩子时被人偷走的！
data.Sentence: It was stolen twenty years ago when Dan was a boy of fifteen!
